description: Apart from the fact that Kathryn from SteinArt has enough sage growing in her garden to keep us in sage tea for the next decade, our collective has a vast bank of (sage) knowledge and experience that we wanted to share collaboratively with others who have similar values.  And for those who understand itâ€™s potential health benefits, we just felt sage fitted with our collective intention to create and encourage a good healthy work-life integration.
name: Sage Room
subheading: Growing High Value, Positive Impact Businesses, Led By Ethical Leaders With Space To Breathe
